name: ng-talkback
description: A node.js HTTP proxy that records and playbacks requests
author: Ignacio Piantanida

scripts.ci: yarn ts-check && yarn test && yarn build && USE_DIST=1 yarn test
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha -r mocha-setup.js --extensions ts,js "test/**/*.spec.{ts,js}"
